articles.content: Leeds are facing a potential exodus of top players if they are relegated from the Premier League with a host of top-flight rivals ready to trigger release clauses if Jesse Marsch's side go down to th… [+3805 chars]

articles.author: William Pickworth
articles.title: 'No agreement' - Kylian Mbappe breakthrough denied amid Liverpool transfer rumours - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool and Real Madrid target Kylian Mbappe has not signed a new deal at Paris Saint-Germain according to his mother despite reports earlier tonight suggesting the Frenchman had signed a new two year deal.
articles.content:
The mother of reported Liverpool target Kylian Mbappe has denied her son has signed a new deal at Paris Saint-Germain, stating there is no agreement.
Reports earlier tonight from Le Parisien had sug… [+912 chars]

articles.title: How Maradona's 'Hand of God' goal sparked feud between referee and assistant - Daily Mail
articles.description: When Diego Maradona scored his 'Hand of God' goal in the 1986 World Cup, referee Ali Bin Nasser his Bulgarian assistant Bogdan Dotchev exchanged hesitant glances.
articles.content:
They were the men who could have changed history - if only they had disallowed the world's most famous goal in front of more than 100,000 fans.
